subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria won his second race in two days, capturing a slalom in Bansko, Bulgaria, and drawing closer to the overall leader Ivica Kostelic of Croatia in the World Cup standings.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria won his second race in two days, capturing a slalom in Bansko, Bulgaria, and drawing closer to the overall leader Ivica Kostelic of Croatia in the World Cup standings.
